LanguageData.WallTurretMiniGun.label: wall minigun turret
LanguageData.WallTurretMiniGun.description:
A couple of miniguns strapped onto a wall turret, these things are ridiculously fast, and have high HP compared to the rest of the turrets, but burn through barrels quickly due to the fact that they fire non stop until the target is dead.
They require more power to keep the barrels spinning at all times.
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretMiniGun.label: wall turret minigun
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretMiniGun.description: A couple of miniguns strapped onto a wall turret.
